page.title: 04A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: amused! After Assembly we did some maths until break. At playtime we had relay race practise. We have a village schools sports coming up soon. After play we did some creative writing until 12pm. I usually have dinner with the infants because I serve them their food. Today I couldn't, more relay practise! Dinner was tasty but I didn't fancy the egg custard. After lunch I practised the glockenspiel parts for a special concert we are having with a local secondary school. When I got back there was only time for my teacher to read a bit of our story before home time. My friend keeps a note of the 'coach people' so we are sure the children in the villages catch the coach home. When she gets back we all go home. No Country Dancing Club so home to tea!
